description: small round dark red hat with two embroidered panels; bottom panel in metallic gold discolored to copper and silver threads in geometric pattern; top panel with serpentine pattern surrounding small medallions embroidered in metallic gold discolored to copper and silver, and gold threads; crown of hat with gold thread chain stitch at edge and diamond outlined pattern in middle in gold, light blue and light orange thread; dark red fabric printed with small light orange and light blue design
dimension: 4 x 7 x 7 in. (10.16 x 17.78 x 17.78 cm) (approximate)
title: Hat
